statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-3 \, x^{3} + x^{2} - 3 , -13 \, x^{3} - 9 \, x^{2} + 15 \, x - 13 , 7 \, x^{3} + 3 \, x^{2} - 6 \, x + 7 , 2 \, x^{3} + 5 \, x - 1 , 5 \, x^{3} + x^{2} - 3 \, x + 5\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
